name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-requirement-targeting-mutual-dependency-nodejs
title: Specify relationships between app capabilities
shortDescription: This sample Node.js app showcases how to specify mutual-dependency relationships between app capabilities in Microsoft Teams using the 'elementRelationshipSet' property in the app manifest.
longDescription: The Microsoft 365 RT Sample App Feature provides an implementation of mutual-dependency relationships among Teams app capabilities, including bots, tabs, and compose extensions. By utilizing the 'elementRelationshipSet' property in the app manifest, it illustrates how these elements can interconnect and enhance the user experience in Teams.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing mutual-dependency relationships between app capabilities

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
